      long getNumberOfRecords()
      Gets the estimates number of records in the file, computed as the file size divided by the average record width, rounded up.

      • getNumberOfRecords

        public long getNumberOfRecords()
        从类复制的说明: FileInputFormat.FileBaseStatistics
        Gets the estimates number of records in the file, computed as the file size divided by the average record width, rounded up.
        指定者:
        getNumberOfRecords 在接口中 BaseStatistics
        覆盖:
        getNumberOfRecords 在类中 FileInputFormat.FileBaseStatistics
        返回:
        The estimated number of records in the file.
        另请参阅:
        BaseStatistics.getNumberOfRecords()
